text:
Local Government (Audit Panels) Amendment Order 2015

I make the following order under section 85B(1) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

19 November 2015

PETER GUTWEIN

Minister for Planning and Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Audit Panels) Amendment Order 2015 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 January 2016.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Local Government (Audit Panels) Order 2014 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Audit Panels) Order 2014 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 December 2015

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
